SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "INFO:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :ENDIF
